projects.name: Online Task Management System Development
projects.description: Designed and implemented a web-based task management system using React.js and Node.js. Integrated MongoDB for database management and user authentication. Collaborated with a team of 4 to deliver the project on time and within scope. Complete detailed programming and development tasks for front end public and internal websites as well as challenging back-end server code. Carry out quality assurance tests to discover errors and optimize usability.

projects.name: Smart Home Automation
projects.description: Developed an IoT-based smart home automation system using Raspberry Pi and Python. Programmed sensors to monitor temperature, humidity, and light levels. Implemented a mobile app for remote control and monitoring.
